verses.roman:
taiche saba avatārera kṛṣṇa se kāraṇa
āra eka śloka śuna, kuvyākhyā-khaṇḍana

synonyms: taiche—in a similar way; saba—all; avatārera—of the incarnations; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; se—He; kāraṇa—the cause; āra—another; eka—one; śloka—verse; śuna—please hear; ku-vyākhyā—fallacious explanations; khaṇḍana—refuting.
translation: "Kṛṣṇa, in the same way, is the cause of all causes and all incarnations. Please hear another verse to defeat all misinterpretations.
